Additional Scope Comments: All account holders other than Capstone account holders will be covered by Item 011.All email will be cutoff for Capstone account holders at the end of employee tenure.  Transfer 25 years after cutoff.
Legacy Email Scope: The Library will be including legacy e-mail for all account holders dating back to approximately 2010.  Legacy e-mail prior to 2010 will be destroyed as records from that period were covered by a print and file policy.

Additional Scope Comments: Item 010 - cut off at the end of tenure.Item 011 - will be applied to all positions not listed below as Capstone Accounts.Since the NSA/CSS Director is also the Commander, U.S. Cyber Command, the scope includes email records created/received by the Commander, U.S. Cyber Command. The Records Group for U.S. Cyber Command is 218.The majority of positions have three accounts (high, medium, low).
Legacy Email Scope: A traditional records management approach with a print-to-file policy was enforced prior to Capstone adoption, as well as use of other disposition authorities to capture email. Some legacy email, however, exists; the scope of legacy email varies by position with the earliest date being 1999.
URL to Agency Organization Chart: Review of agency organization chart conducted by NARA Records Appraisal and Agency Assistance staff during appraisal visit on 17 November 2015.
